title: Grounded Theory by Graham R Gibbs
description: In this two part video, Graham R Gibbs introduces the idea of developing grounded theory and discusses some of the core elements  of the approach to qualitative data analysis. See: Gibbs, Graham Robert. (2012) 'Grounded theory, coding and computer-assisted analysis'. In S. Becker, A. Bryman & H. Ferguson (eds.), Understanding Research for Social Policy and Social Work: Themes, Methods and Approaches. 2nd edn. Bristol: Policy Press. pp. 337-343.

title: Track your SE Engineering Research Venues in one place
description: Deadline countdowns for academic conferences in Software Engineering
